p:
Changes in the unit cell parameters of
1 a
induced by increased pressure or varying temperature are presented in Figure 4. There was a uniform tendency of all variables, but the
Î²
angle to shrink monotonically with increased pressure or lowered temperature. Experimental values tended to be slightly higher than theoretical predictions for the increasing pressure series. The discrepancies did not exceed 4% of the values at atmospheric pressure. Up to 4.5 GPa, there were no indications of possible phase transitions.
